sn25.10:1.2: “Mendicants, form is impermanent, decaying, and perishing.
sn25.10:1.6: and consciousness are impermanent, decaying, and perishing.
sn25.10:1.7: Someone who has faith and confidence in these teachings is called a follower by faith. They’ve stepped into surety in the right way, they’ve stepped into the level of the true person, and they’ve transcended the level of the untrue person.
sn25.10:1.8: They can’t do any deed which would make them be reborn in hell, the animal realm, or the ghost realm.
sn25.10:1.9: They can’t die without realizing the fruit of stream-entry.
sn25.10:2.1: Someone who accepts these teachings after deliberating them with a degree of wisdom is called a follower of teachings. They’ve stepped into surety in the right way, they’ve stepped into the level of the true person, and they’ve transcended the level of the untrue person.
sn25.10:2.2: They can’t do any deed which would make them be reborn in hell, the animal realm, or the ghost realm.
sn25.10:2.3: They can’t die without realizing the fruit of stream-entry.
sn25.10:2.4: Someone who understands and sees these principles is called
sn25.10:2.5: a stream-enterer, not liable to be reborn in the underworld, bound for awakening.”
sn25.10:3.5: The Linked Discourses on stepping into are complete.
